column4: Someone know why my fullscreen applications get windowed after a while, and I have to minimize them then maximize again to make it fullscreen?
Depends on the application. Some will use F11, others Ctrl-f  others Ctrl-Shift-f
thanks, I'll try that combination if it happens again
Firefox uses F11  (like I said, some applications use other keyboard short-cuts to toggle on and off full screen mode).
